meanings.definition: A person or group that deploys something.
meanings.sent1: The deployers set up the tents for the camping trip.
meanings.sent2: The deployers quickly assembled the emergency shelter.
meanings.sent3: The deployers accidentally deployed the wrong equipment, causing a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The deployers were like busy bees, spreading out to get everything ready.
meanings.sent5: The deployers worked together seamlessly to get the job done efficiently.

meanings.sent1: The successful deployment of the new software pleased the team of deployers.
meanings.sent2: The deployment of troops to the border was a strategic move.
meanings.sent3: During the drill, the deployment of the parachute went comically wrong.
meanings.sent4: The deployment of resources in the project was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The rapid deployment of the firefighters saved the building from further damage.
